remarks: Value of the group subtraction operation in a quotient group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
qusgrp.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
qusinv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` G ) $.
qussub.p $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
qussub.a $e |- N = ( -g ` H ) $.
qussub $p |- ( ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( [ X ] ( G ~QG S ) N [ Y ] ( G ~QG S ) ) = [ ( X .- Y ) ] ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
